label: Gagné, Raymond J. & Jean Etienne.  2015. Three new genera and three new species of Lasiopteridi (Diptera:  Cecidomyiidae) on Rubiaceae from Guadeloupe, French West Indies,  and a key to genera of Neotropical Lasiopteridi unplaced to tribe. Zootaxa 4028(4): 511–526.
value: Gagné, Raymond J. & Jean Etienne.  2015. Three new genera and three new species of Lasiopteridi (Diptera:  Cecidomyiidae) on Rubiaceae from Guadeloupe, French West Indies,  and a key to genera of Neotropical Lasiopteridi unplaced to tribe. Zootaxa 4028(4): 511–526.
title: Three new genera and three new species of Lasiopteridi (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae) on Rubiaceae from Guadeloupe, French West Indies, and a key to genera of Neotropical Lasiopteridi unplaced to tribe
